'''"Passage's Stable Storage"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Passage's Stable Storage" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Fort Charybdis Ruins]]. Enter the [[Looking Glass]] after completing {{Quest|Book of Esoteric Revelations}}.
